channel.title: [508] Attack styles?
channel.description:
alright well heres the problem when using a scimitar the attack styles are messy, chop trains defence, slash trains defence, attack smash trains def, attack, and str, same with block
rather new to 508's been looking around and cant seem to find where to fix this
